snippet.title: Fia's Night Out | RPG Maker Game | No Commentary
snippet.description:
*Warning for depictions of blood.

Game: Fia's Night Out
Find the game here: https://arcadekitten.itch.io/fias-night-out
Original creator: arcadekitten
Release Date: 2024
Engine: RPG Maker MV
I do NOT own anything on this video, all credit to their respective creators.

If the creator wants me to take this down, please tell me.


A short little game for the holidays. I've been familiar with arcadekitten's work for a good while now but haven't played much of her games. Like the only one I've played is the one about a basement.

I do like her art though and also like what I've seen of her games so I decided to play this since it was short and fitting and also I needed an excuse to record as long games can be harder for me to start... Especially after so long...

Regarding the game, it's a nice, cute little experience. I enjoyed it even if I do think it's 11 candies you need for the true ending and not 10 but maybe that's just a me thing as I do enjoy nice round numbers. 

I do have some other thoughts but right now I can't word them as well as I want to so I'll end it here.

Anyway, a short cute game. I liked it.

(I swear I don't know how to write these descriptions. Sorry for the disjointedness.)
